title: 15-year-old shot, killed self in accidental shooting in Detroit
content:
DETROIT - Detroit Police say a 15-year-old boy accidentally shot and killed himself Saturday night.
WXYZ reported that the shooting occurred at a home in the 14800 block of Steel St. on Detroit's northwest side.
Police are calling the self-inflicted gunshot wound accidental, as the teen did not appear to have emotional issues.
Police still are investigating the shooting, and stressed the importance of keeping guns secure in the home.
It's unclear who the gun belonged to.
Ian Thibodeau is the business and development reporter for MLive Media Group in Detroit. He can be reached at ithibode@mlive.com, or follow him on Twitter.
